about_the_game:
Here's a new game from the creator of Don't Be Afraid and Mandela Invasion!




ALYSSA is a adventure game with horror elements, in which you play a 9-year-old girl from a broken family who hears disturbing voices in her head. They promise her that they know where she will find her longed-for happy life, but to find it, she will have to murder everyone who stands in her way.

Alyssa will murder discreetly, and the environment is perfect for it. From poisoning tea to initiating explosions, you'll find plenty of opportunities in the levels. Will you be able to find them all? However, remember not to get caught, because if someone catches you in suspicious activity - it means your end.

Due to the fact that Alyssa is not an ordinary child, she will be able to use the help of ghosts and demons. With them, you will easily scare someone to force them to go to another place or cause interesting phenomena. Of course, these beings will want something in return, so before they are available, you will need to convince them with something.

Sometimes you will also meet people and creatures that will try to harm you. In this case, you will avoid detection and look for opportunities to get out of a place. Not everyone is defenseless!

The player's task is to murder targets while remaining undetected, using only elements of the environment. Which way will you choose? Which creatures will you use in your journey? Will you discover all the secrets? And above all - will you help Alyssa find happiness?



  • Atmospheric and beautiful graphics in isometric view
  • Lots of diverse levels (apartments, churches, cemeteries, forests)
  • Many ways to murder
  • Free exploration of levels with hidden secrets
  • Shocking storyline reminiscent of classic horror movies

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content inappropriate for all ages or not suitable for viewing at work: Frequent violence or brutality, Adult content.
